Skip-link demo

If you use the skip-link, the next focusable item should be the following link: First link inside main tag, as it's the first interactive element inside the main tag.

If you don't use the skip-link, pressing the tab key will move you sequentially through all the focusable items on the page and you will eventually get to following link: Last link inside main tag.
